text: Divatte-sur-Loire () is a commune of 6,844 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 from the former communes of La Chapelle-Basse-Mer (the seat) and Barbechat.Arrêté préfectoral 20 October 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Divatte-sur-Loire
